review: Dr. Chetan is a very patient doctor. He listens to your issues and gets to the root of your problem. Previously showed to two doctors who were unable to diagnose the issue. However, Dr. Chetan understood the entire process of how the injury happened. I had a recurrent ligament tear since a really long time and under his guidance, I have been recovering. He is indeed very compassionate.

Dr Chetan Chaudhary is highly experienced and a very polite doctor . He is never in a rush and gives a patient ear to your ailment  , explains the diagnosis and line of treatment needed in detail . Unlike other doctors he asks for diagnostic tests only if they are really needed . He is our go to Dr. for any kind of ortho distress .
